attributes.action: Remove/ban any religeous text that promotes hate or violence.
attributes.background: Remove/ban any verse In a religeous book which might incite the reader to commit violence, also remove/ban any verse calling for amputation or stoning to death or throwing a person from a tall building as a punishment, under the obscene publications acts.

rejection.details: The courts, not the Government or Parliament, are responsible for interpreting the law. This includes the Obscene Publications Act.
